柀字的基本解释

柀
bǐ
榧树。
离析；破裂。
一部分。

柀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐ］
［《廣韻》甫委切，上紙，幫。］
(1)木名。杉科植物。《尔雅·释木》：“柀，煔。”郭璞注：“煔似松，生江南，可以爲船及棺材；作柱，埋之不腐。”邢昺疏：“柀，一名煔，俗作杉。”一说，柀即榧。
(2)破裂；离析。
(3)谓一部分。

柀字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柀； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页518第03
【唐韻】【韻會】甫委切【集韻】補靡切，?音彼。【說文】檆也。【爾雅·釋木】柀，煔。【疏】柀一名煔。　又【集韻】普靡切，披上聲。義同。　又【本草別錄】榧實一名柀子。詳榧字註。

柀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
柀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Jade
bǐ
Torreya tree.
Segregation; rupture.
Part.
Jade
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǐ］
["Guangyun" just cut, put on paper, help. ]
(1) Wooden name. Fir family plants. "Erya Shimu": "Yun, 煔." Guo Pu's note: "It is like a pine, born in the south of the Yangtze River. It can be used as a ship and coffin; it can be used as a pillar, and it will not be decayed when buried." Xing Mingshu: "Yun, one person Ye, the vulgar is the fir." When he said, 柀 is 榧.
(2) Fracture; segregation.
(3) Said part.
Jade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柀; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 518 03
【Tang Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Finally cut [Ji Yun] to make up the extravagant cut, the sound of the other [Said the text] Ye Ye. [Erya Shimu] Jie, 煔. 【Sparse】Yuan Yiyi.　[Jiyun] universally cut, put on sound. The same meaning.　[Materia Medica Don't Record] There is a cedar tree. Detailed notes of torreya characters.
Jade
